function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of prioritization of public health concerns in design decisions","Impact":"Increased susceptibility to contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Incorporating public health guidelines and regulations into the design process","Technologies":"Health monitoring systems, air filtration systems, antimicrobial surfaces","People":"Community stakeholders, designers, architects","Owner":"Designers, architects, public health officials"},{"Description":"Ineffective integration of natural systems into building construction","Impact":"Risk of creating environments conducive to disease transmission","Mitigation":"Adopting regenerative design principles that prioritize ecological health and resilience","Technologies":"Green building materials, sustainable energy systems, natural ventilation systems","People":"Builders, architects, environmentalists","Owner":"Builders, environmental agencies, architects"},{"Description":"Lack of community involvement and connection to the built environment","Impact":"Increased risk of neglecting public health and sanitation standards","Mitigation":"Engaging community stakeholders in the design and development process, promoting community awareness and ownership","Technologies":"Community engagement platforms, participatory design tools, public health education resources","People":"Community stakeholders, designers, urban planners","Owner":"Designers, urban planners, community organizations"}]}
